long_description: The Yurbuds Ironman Inspire Pro earphones will transform your athletic experience with a secure and comfortable fit. They were conceived by an engineer training for his first Ironman. Patented twist lock technology locks Yurbuds securely into your ears and keep them there through all kinds of intense physical movement. Ergonomic design employs medical-grade silicone to offer a soft, comfortable and personalized fit that avoids pressing sensitive pain points. Clinically proven acoustics deliver deep, rich sound with all types of music, yet they allow sufficient ambient noise to keep you aware of your surroundings. Dry Mic 3-button control allows convenient navigation of music during rigorous activity as well as hands-free calls-even in the rain. Durable, sweat-proof and water-resistant earphones deliver reliable performance in almost any conditions. Angled plug relieves strain on the wire. The Yurbuds Ironman Inspire Pro earphones are compatible with iPod(R), iPad(R), and iPhone(R) and come with a zippered soft case.
short_description: The Yurbuds Ironman Inspire Pro earphones will transform your athletic experience with a secure and comfortable fit. They were conceived by an engineer training for his first Ironman.
